snippet.title: Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria Is Our First Ever Look At The Fourth Age | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Find out more about The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria, the upcoming survival crafting game set in the Fourth Age of Middle-earth. Game director Jon-Paul Dumont fills us in on some interesting new details about the game set in the beloved fantasy world created by J.R.R. Tolkien, and discusses John Rhys-Davies’ return as Gimli, how singing works, different biomes, and more. 

The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria follows the Dwarves as they embark on a new adventure to reclaim their legendary home of Moria, nestled beneath the Misty Mountains. Players can embark on this adventure solo or with up to seven friends, managing their light, noise, hunger, and sleep levels to survive the dangerous depths. 

The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria will be released on PC and new gen consoles in 2023.

#IGN #gamescom #LordOfTheRings
